div.p: Group 1 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/SubstanceReferenceInformation|5.0.0 to unspecified code system

tr.td: Element `SubstanceReferenceInformation` is not mapped to FHIR R4, since FHIR R5 `SubstanceReferenceInformation` is not mapped.

Element `SubstanceReferenceInformation.meta` is not mapped to FHIR R4, since FHIR R5 `SubstanceReferenceInformation` is not mapped. Element matches Basic element path `Resource.meta` and is compatible, use that element instead.

Element `SubstanceReferenceInformation.implicitRules` is not mapped to FHIR R4, since FHIR R5 `SubstanceReferenceInformation` is not mapped. Element matches Basic element path `Resource.implicitRules` and is compatible, use that element instead.

Element `SubstanceReferenceInformation.language` is not mapped to FHIR R4, since FHIR R5 `SubstanceReferenceInformation` is not mapped. Element matches Basic element path `Resource.language` and is compatible, use that element instead.

Element `SubstanceReferenceInformation.text` is not mapped to FHIR R4, since FHIR R5 `SubstanceReferenceInformation` is not mapped. Element matches Basic element path `DomainResource.text` and is compatible, use that element instead.
